name: OrangeHRM
overview:
OrangeHRM is an open source Human Resource Management (HRM) firm. Orange offers, free, stable and highly usable HRM solution. Orange also offers Personal Information Management, Employee Self Service, Leave Management, Time and Attendance tracking, Health Savings Plans and Recruitment.

OrangeHRM Live; Web-based Human Resource management system is the advanced version of the open source version of OrangeHRM. It is hosted on highly secured servers, deployed in minutes, global and scalable HR system for modern HR Management needs.

Faster Implementation, Significant savings on expensive servers, IT staff and expertise.

Key benefits ,

  1. Pay per employee
  2. Advance Features
  3. Web based (SaaS)
  4. Can deployed within minutes
  5. Hosted on highly secured servers
  6. Backed up by professional support
  7. Cccessible from anywhere in the world
